Subject: Re: Directions for Scorp
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Scorponok hears the eruption of firepower behind him. He turns too se a
barrage coming towards him, as his jaw (like a deer in the headlights) One
of the lasers rips into his armor and a missile lands close causing an
eruptions. As he clutches his shoulder and looks up he is met with a rocket
right to the chest and he is flung back into the water by the explosion.
Pieces of his armor scatterd everywhere. Trying to lift his head to see
what hit him he says "slag" and lets his head submerge disapearing.
